traceapp.core

Class TraceAppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • traceapp.core.TraceAppController

  • public class TraceAppController
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the SDNTrace protocol. This class should be able to be integrated into most any OpenFlow controller.
    Author:
    Aaron Pabst

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TraceAppController.PortMacPair
      Wrapper class for associating ports with mac addresses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TraceAppController(traceapp.core.INetwork network)
      Starts up a new instance of TraceApp to control the specified INetwork.

    • Method Summary

      void OnPortStatusChange(long dpid, int portNum, long mac)
      To be called whenever OF Receives a PortStatusChanged message Pass -1 for mac address to signal that there is no longer an address on this port

    • Method Detail

      • SwitchInfoReceived

        public void SwitchInfoReceived(java.lang.Long dpid,
                      java.util.Collection<TraceAppController.PortMacPair> mp)
        Used to notify the App that a new switch has been connected
        Parameters:
        dpid - - The id for the switch
        mp - - The initial state of the ports on the switch

      • PacketIn

        public void PacketIn(traceapp.core.TracePacket pkt,
            long dpid)
        Used to notify this object of a packet in. Should be called on ALL packetIn messages.
        Parameters:
        pkt - - A network packet as defined in traceapp.core
        dpid - - The DPID of the switch the message was generated on
        port - - The port the packet came in on. For learning purposes.

      • OnPortStatusChange

        public void OnPortStatusChange(long dpid,
                      int portNum,
                      long mac)
        To be called whenever OF Receives a PortStatusChanged message Pass -1 for mac address to signal that there is no longer an address on this port
